title: Poojaiketha Poovidhu Song Lyrics Neethana Andha Kuyil
stanzas:
Poojaiketha Poovidhu Song Lyrics Neethana Andha Kuyil
#Ilaiyaraja

Poojai kaetha poovidhu
nethu thaana poothathu
ada poothadhu yaara adha
paarthadhu.(2)

maela poata thavani
seelai aagi ponadhu
seelai iluthu viduvadhe
velai aagi ponadhu
kokku onnu kokki
poduthu hoi..

Poojai kaetha poovidhu
nethu thaana poothathu
ada poothadhu yaara adha
paarthadhu

achu vella pechula
aala thookkura
konja neram pesuna
kooli kaetkura

Oorellaam unna pathi
verum vaaya mella.
thothaadha yaarum illa
thoodhu solla.

vaai vaartha pombalaiku
pothaadhu pulla
kanjaada pola oru
baashai illai

suthi suthi vandhu ne
soapu podura
kotti pona kudimikku
seepa thaedura

enna paarthu enna kaeta
yaeta yaendi maathura
kaala neram koodi pochu
maala vandhu maathura

Poojai kaetha poovidhu
nethu thaana poothathu
ada poothadhu yaara adha
paarthadhu.(2)

maela poata thavani
seelai aagi ponadhu
seelai iluthu viduvadhe
velai aagi ponadhu
kokku onnu kokki
poduthu hoi..

Poojai kaetha poovidhu
nethu thaana poothathu
ada poothadhu yaara adha
paarthadhu
